eventDecorators.name: DiamondCut
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new COMP speed is calculated for a market. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

functionDecorators.name: diamondCut
functionDecorators.description: Add/replace/remove any number of functions and optionally execute a function with delegatecall.

parameterDecorators.name: _diamondCut
parameterDecorators.description: Contains the facet addresses and function selectors.

parameterDecorators.name: _init
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contract or facet to execute _calldata.

parameterDecorators.name: _calldata
parameterDecorators.description: A function call, including function selector and arguments _calldata is executed with delegatecall on _init.
